籤詩版本二:
Utshintsho lokomoya lukaBuddha kunye nolwazi lwakho; Intetho yesidenge ijika ibe yikoma
Ixhego lacela igqirha, kutheni lingalindi ixesha?
詩意:
Le hexagram luphawu lokuyigcina ingaguquguquki kwaye ingashukumi.
Yonke into iza ngexesha elifanelekileyo.
解曰:
Ithamsanqa eligqibeleleyo. Ndiza kukunika okusemandleni am. Musa ukuchukumisa ukholo oludala. Lixesha lokulinda.
Olu luphawu olupheleleyo. Yonke into ayihambanga kakuhle. Intsikelelo enkulu. Inokuqinisekisa uxolo.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Iinkonzo Ezintathu Zithetha
Ebudeni bolawulo loMlawuli uWu woMkhosi woMkhosi wakwaZhou waseMntla, ezi nkonzo zintathu (uConfucius, ubuBhuda, nobuTao) zazingavisisaniyo. Umlawuli wabiza intlanganiso kawonke-wonke waza wacela ubuConfucius, ubuBhuda nobuTao ukuba buxoxisane.” Emva kweengxoxo ezintathu, akuzange kufike sigqibo.
Eli bali lisisikweko: ezi nkonzo zintathu yinkolo enye, isidenge esingenangqiqo, umntu onamandla kunye nophikisanayo, kunye nezenzo zesidenge.
聖意: Lo ngumqondiso opheleleyo, yonke into iya kuba yinto engathandekiyo, kwaye iya kuzisa iintsikelelo ezinkulu kwaye iqinisekise uxolo.
